ServiceResourceCapacity.name: ServiceResourceCapacity
ServiceResourceCapacity.description: Represents the maximum number of scheduled hours or number of service appointments that a capacity-based service resource can complete within a specific time period.

CapacityInHours.description: The number of hours that the resource can work per time period. You must fill out this field, the CapacityInWorkItems field, or both.

CapacityInWorkItems.description: The total number of service appointments that the resource can complete per time period. You must fill out this field, the CapacityInHours field, or both.

CapacityNumber.description: (Read only) An auto-generated number identifying the capacity record.

EndDate.description: The date the capacity ends; for example, the end date of a contract.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, this record might only have been referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

ServiceResourceId.description: The associated service resource. You can set multiple capacities for a resource as long as their start and end dates do not overlap.

StartDate.description: The date the capacity goes into effect.

TimePeriod.description: Days, Hours, or Months. For example, if a resource can work 80 hours per month, the capacityâ€™s Time Period would be Month and Hours per Time Period would be 80.
